$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Ba.caption: Bottom Bar Pop Out on Hover Style

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Ba.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Bar Pop Out on Hover Style

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Ba.caption: Bottom Bar Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Ba.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Ba.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Bar Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Ba.text:
Bottom Bar Height: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_bar_height'/>
Amount of Bottom Bar Hidden: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_bar_hidden_size'/> (Used for the pop out on hover style, this should be negative and Bottom Bar Height+Amount Hidden>0)
Bottom Bar Background Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_bar_background_color'/>
Show Bottom Bar Border: <$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_bar_border' checked=solid unchecked=none/>
Bottom Bar Border Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_bar_border_color'/>
Bottom Bar Text Size: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_bar_text_size'/>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Le.caption: Bottom Left Menu Basic Style
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Le.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Le.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Left Menu Basic Style

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Le.caption: Bottom Left Menu Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Le.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Le.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Left Menu Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Le.text:
Vertical Offset: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_left_menu_vertical_offset'/>
Left Offset: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_left_menu_left_offset'/>
Font Size <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_left_menu_font_size'/>
Text Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_left_menu_text_color'/> The checkbox sets if the item is in the menu, the numbers in the `Order` column set the order in which the entries appear. <$list filter='[tag[Menu Icon]nsort[bottom_left_menu_order]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Menu Icon]nsort[bottom_left_menu_order]]'>
In Menu? Name Order
<$checkbox tiddler=<> tag='$:/tags/BottomLeftMenu'> <$link to=<>><$view field=caption><$view field='title'/> <$button set="!!bottom_left_menu_order" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} <$button set="!!bottom_left_menu_order" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}}<$edit-text field='bottom_left_menu_order' placeholder='Order' size=4/>

The checkbox sets if the item is in the menu, the numbers in the `Order` column set the order in which the entries appear. <$list filter='[tag[Menu Icon]nsort[bottom_middle_menu_order]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Menu Icon]nsort[bottom_middle_menu_order]]'>

<$checkbox tiddler=<> tag='$:/tags/BottomMiddleMenu'> <$link to=<>><$view field=caption><$view field='title'/> <$button set="!!bottom_middle_menu_order" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} <$button set="!!bottom_middle_menu_order" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}}<$edit-text field='bottom_middle_menu_order' placeholder='Order' size=4/>

In Menu? Name Order

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar/menu
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar.text:
<$reveal type=match state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar/menu!!show_left' text=show>
<$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/BottomLeftMenu]nsort[bottom_left_menu_order]]'><$transclude/>
<$reveal type=match state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar/menu!!show_middle' text=show>
<$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/BottomMiddleMenu]nsort[bottom_middle_menu_order]]'><$transclude/>
<$reveal type=match state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar/menu!!show_right' text=show>
<$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/BottomRightMenu]nsort[bottom_right_menu_order]]'><$transclude/>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Icon Menu.caption: Icon Menu Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Icon Menu.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Icon Menu.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Icon Menu Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Icon Menu.text:
\define thisMakeTiddlerReference()
"""{{$(TiddlerName)$}}"""
\end

\define thisMakeOption()
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference <<TiddlerName>>>>><<currentTiddler>></option>
\end

\define thisTopBarStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='top_bar_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Top Bar Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Top Bar Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisTopLeftMenuStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='top_left_menu_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Top Left Menu Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Top Left Menu Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisTopRightMenuStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='top_right_menu_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Top Right Menu Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Top Right Menu Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisTopMiddleMenuStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='top_middle_menu_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Top Middle Menu Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Top Middle Menu Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisLeftMenuStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Left Menu Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Left Menu Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisRightMenuStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='right_menu_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Right Menu Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Right Menu Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisBottomBarStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_bar_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Bottom Bar Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Bottom Bar Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisBottomLeftMenuStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_left_menu_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Bottom Left Menu Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Bottom Left Menu Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisBottomRightMenuStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_right_menu_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Bottom Right Menu Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Bottom Right Menu Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

\define thisBottomMiddleMenuStyleSelector()
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='bottom_middle_menu_style'>
<$list filter='[tag[Bottom Middle Menu Style]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Bottom Middle Menu Style]]'>
<$set name=TiddlerName value=<<currentTiddler>>>
<option value=<<thisMakeTiddlerReference>>><$view field=caption/></option>
</$set>
</$list>
</$select>
\end

<$button>Set tiddler top position<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storytop' $field=text $value="""{{$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings!!top_bar_height}}"""/></$button> - This sets the position of the top of the story river to the bottom of the top bar. It isn't perfect, but it mostly works.

Toggle menus and set css styles, further custimization is available in the tabs below. 

|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/TopBar/menu' tag='$:/tags/TopRightBar'>Show Top Bar</$checkbox>|<<thisTopBarStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/leftmenu-icons' tag='$:/tags/PageTemplate'>Show Left Menu</$checkbox>|<<thisLeftMenuStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/rightmenu-icons' tag='$:/tags/PageTemplate'>Show Right Menu</$checkbox>|<<thisRightMenuStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/TopBar/menu' field='show_middle' checked='show' unchecked='hide'> Show Top Middle Menu</$checkbox>|<<thisTopMiddleMenuStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenu/TopBar/menu' field='show_left' checked='show' unchecked='hide'> Show Top Left Menu</$checkbox>|<<thisTopLeftMenuStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenu/TopBar/menu' field='show_right' checked='show' unchecked='hide'> Show Top Right Menu</$checkbox>|<<thisTopRightMenuStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar/menu' tag='$:/tags/PageTemplate'>Show Bottom Bar</$checkbox>|<<thisBottomBarStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar/menu' field='show_left' checked='show' unchecked='hide'>Show Bottom Left Menu</$checkbox>|<<thisBottomLeftMenuStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar/menu' field='show_right' checked='show' unchecked='hide'>Show Bottom Right Menu</$checkbox>|<<thisBottomRightMenuStyleSelector>>|
|<$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/BottomBar/menu' field='show_middle' checked='show' unchecked='hide'>Show Bottom Middle</$checkbox>|<<thisBottomMiddleMenuStyleSelector>>|


Tiddlers labeled `<menu name> Style` appear as options here. (So `Top Bar Style`, `Right Menu Style`, etc.)

Menus on the top bar will inherit attributes from the top bar settings if an attribute is set to `inherit` or left blank.

<<tabs "[[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Top Bar Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Right Menu Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Top Left Menu Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Top Middle Menu Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Top Right Menu Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Bar Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Left Menu Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Middle Menu Settings]] [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Bottom Right Menu Settings]]" [[$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Top Bar Settings]]>>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.caption: Left Menu Appear on Hover Style
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu Appear on Hover Style

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.caption: Left Menu Basic Style
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu Basic Style

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.caption: Left Menu Pop Out on Hover Style
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu Pop Out on Hover Style

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.caption: Left Menu Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.creator: inmysocks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/Left Menu.text:
Left Offset: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_left_offset'/> (Distance from the left side of the screen)
Vertical Offset: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_vertical_offset'/> (Distance from the bottom of the top bar or top of the screen)
Width: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_width'/> (Menu width)
Font Size: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_font_size'/>
Text Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_text_color'/>
Background Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_background_color'/>
Show Border: <$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field=left_menu_show_border checked=solid unchecked=''/>
Border Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field=left_menu_border_color/>
Opacity When Hidden: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_hidden_opacity'/> (used for the 'appear on hover' style)
Position of Hidden Menu: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='left_menu_hidden_size'/> (used for the 'pop out on hover' style)
The checkbox sets if the item is in the menu, the numbers in the `Order` column set the order in which the entries appear. <$list filter='[tag[Menu Icon]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Menu Icon]]+[nsort[left_menu_order]]'>
In Menu? Name Order
<$checkbox tiddler=<> tag='$:/tags/LeftMenu'> <$link to=<>><$view field=caption><$view field='title'/> <$button set="!!left_menu_order" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} <$button set="!!left_menu_order" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}}<$edit-text field='left_menu_order' placeholder='Order' size=4/>

$:/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon/Old Hide Men.caption: Old Hide Menu Button
$:/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon/Old Hide Men.creator: inmysocks
$:/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon/Old Hide Men.title: $:/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon/Old Hide Menu Button
$:/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon/Old Hide Men.text:
<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no">
<$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="no" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/HideSideBar/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/HideSideBar/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-right}}</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="match" text="no">
<$button set="$:/state/sidebar" setTo="yes" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/ShowSideBar/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/ShowSideBar/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-left}}</$button>
</$reveal>

Width: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='right_menu_width'/> (Menu width)
Font Size: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='right_menu_font_size'/>
Text Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='right_menu_text_color'/>
Background Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='right_menu_background_color'/>
Show Border: <$checkbox tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field=right_menu_show_border checked=solid unchecked=''/>
Border Color: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field=right_menu_border_color/>
Opacity When Hidden: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='right_menu_hidden_opacity'/> (used for the 'appear on hover' style)
Position of Hidden Menu: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/icon_menu_settings' field='right_menu_hidden_size'/> (used for the 'pop out on hover' style)
The checkbox sets if the item is in the menu, the numbers in the `Order` column set the order in which the entries appear. <$list filter='[tag[Menu Icon]][plugintiddlers[]tag[Menu Icon]]+[nsort[right_menu_order]]'>
In Menu? Name Order
<$checkbox tiddler=<> tag='$:/tags/RightMenu'> <$link to=<>><$view field=caption><$view field='title'/> <$button set="!!right_menu_order" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} <$button set="!!right_menu_order" setTo=<> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}}<$edit-text field='right_menu_order' placeholder='Order' size=4/>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/TopBar/me.creator: inmysocks

$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/TopBar/me.text:
<$reveal type=match state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenu/TopBar/menu!!show_left' text=show>
<$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/TopLeftMenu]nsort[top_left_menu_order]][plugintiddlers[]tag[$:/tags/TopLeftMenu]nsort[top_left_menu_order]]'><$transclude/>
<$reveal type=match state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenus/TopBar/menu!!show_middle' text=show>
<$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/TopMiddleMenu]nsort[top_middle_menu_order]][plugintiddlers[]tag[$:/tags/TopMiddleMenu]nsort[top_middle_menu_order]]'><$transclude/>
<$reveal type=match state='$:/plugins/inmysocks/iconmenu/TopBar/menu!!show_right' text=show>
<$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/TopRightMenu]nsort[top_right_menu_order]][plugintiddlers[]tag[$:/tags/TopRightMenu]nsort[top_right_menu_order]]'><$transclude/>

<$button popup='$:/state/createnewtiddler' class='tc-btn-invisible' tooltip='New Tiddler from Template'>{{$:/core/images/new-button}}<$reveal type='popup' state='$:/state/createnewtiddler'>
Create New Tiddler Using Template: <$list filter='[prefix[New Tiddler Template - ]]' variable=TemplateName><$button><$view tiddler=<> field=title/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-new-tiddler' $param=<>/>
